entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
